Unitron/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:




Unitron sent a transmission to the Alliance base, telling them he wanted to 
join.

---

"What shall I say, Emperor?" Scattershot asked.

"Tell him he can join.  Tell him to help our guys out at the Ark."

"Yes sir."

---

Unitron changed his course for the Ark, full speed, arming his missiles and 
powering up his laser weapons.
